plot: Smart, successful and independent, Maria finds solice living alone. She has no idea José lives inside her ear, playing his cello, whispering his devotion, caring for her as best a small man can.
title: Maria & Jose
plot_es: Smart, successful and independent, Maria finds solice living alone. She has no idea José lives inside her ear, playing his cello, whispering his devotion, caring for her as best a small man can.
plot_en: Smart, successful and independent, Maria finds solice living alone. She has no idea José lives inside her ear, playing his cello, whispering his devotion, caring for her as best a small man can.
